metadata.name: Everything's LOUDER in Texas
metadata.description:
This piece titled, “Everything is LOUDER in Texas” is an animated digital work which evolved from the mural painted live during the Proof of Party Event in Austin, Texas (March of 2022).

Owning the 1/1 NFT also provides you ownership of the original physical hand painted canvas. Redemption of the physical canvas requires holding the NFT for 6 months. If the NFT is traded in the secondary market, the clock will reset. Before buying the NFT on the secondary market, please join the LOUD WORLD discord to verify if the physical has been claimed and for details on how to claim if you’re the holder.  Any shipping charges are the responsibility of the collector. 

Installation Photo: 
https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZAeMFeWS9yTzAujvDZ4CgpwCtm7JQGKT3VnGYuUQ6JVx

Original Work:  
Title: “Everything is LOUDER in Texas”  
Canvas Size: 8ft x 12ft 
Medium - Acrylic Spray Paint on Canvas
